title: Do you think Valerie Bertinelli still loves Eddie Van Halen even though they divorced years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, Bertinelli was with him for decades, and divorced him because she couldn’t take his addictions any longer. Outside of the addictions both were faithful to each other. Their marriage seemingly was scandal free, and their son apparently was well loved by both of them. I’m sure Bertinelli still cared for him, and if not for his addictions, she probably would have stayed married to him.

upvoters.user_id: Justin Mishina 三品 亮司

response.answer_text: Of course. I think she is remarried now. I’m sure she still loves him. I remember their divorce and Valerie saying she couldn't deal with his drinking anymore…but their divorce didn't seem that messy….I think I remember her saying at the time she’d always love him. Valerie seems like a good person (you never know, but she does seem that way)….She just couldn't continue hanging on, standing by to watch Eddie drown.

Absolutely. Eddie and Valerie were married for a long time and have a son together. Bertinelli was at his bed she side when Eddie died. Love is not a light switch. I will always love my ex-wives to an extent. Is the love passionate and unconditional? I would not go that far. But each holds part of my heart.

Yes. Valerie will always love Eddie. Some soulmates travel with us all the way. Some are by our side only for a while. Nevertheless, they are always there, even when they are not physically. Valerie says she's looking forward to seeing Eddie again on the other side one day.
